name: An Average Day
description:
As a kid, you only have a *simple* task: get up and go to school in the morning, and return to bed at night. However, something (someone) is not making this easy... 

An Average Day is a grid-based puzzle-solving adventure where the only mechanic is just: the player's actions influence the future. It becomes pretty treacherous to move around when you have these in your house: a “copycat” that copies your move, an annoying little that’s always mocking you and a kind mom who moves the house onto a volcano for a sauna...
